bucket_name.description: UiPath storage bucket name that contains the document.

blob_file_path.description: Path of the file inside the storage bucket.

folder_path.description: Optional Orchestrator folder path where the bucket resides.

project_type.description: Project flavor. Use MODERN or IXP when extracting without classification_results.

project_name.description: DU Modern or IXP project name. Required when classification_results are not provided.

project_tag.description: Published tag (for example staging, live). Required when classification_results are not provided.

document_type_name.description: Required when project_type is MODERN or PRETRAINED and classification_results are not provided.

classification_results.description: List of classification results to reuse for extraction instead of classifying again.

validated_classification_action.description: Validation action used to retrieve validated classification results when validate_classification is true.

validate_classification.description: When true, fetch validated classification results from the provided validated_classification_action.

validate_extraction.description: When true, create a validation action for the extraction results.

action_priority.description: Priority for the validation action (LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, CRITICAL).

action_catalog.description: Action catalog name for the validation action.

action_folder.description: Folder where the validation action should be created.

storage_bucket_name.description: Storage bucket name used for validation actions.

storage_bucket_directory_path.description: Directory path in the storage bucket for validation actions.

bucket_name.description: UiPath storage bucket name that contains the document when provided.

blob_file_path.description: Path of the file inside the storage bucket when provided.

project_name.description: DU Modern or IXP project name when applicable.

document_type_id.description: Document type identifier returned by extraction.

extraction_results.description: Extraction results returned by UiPath Documents.

validation_action.description: ValidateExtractionAction created when validate_extraction is true.
